title: How Concerning Is Stafford's Elbow?
description:
Pablo Torre, Domonique Foxworth, and Spencer Hall debate how concerning Mathew Stafford’s elbow injury is for the Rams, where they think LeBron will play after this year with he and the Lakers currently engaged in extension talks, if Kyler Murray calling plays was a valuable exercise and what the chances are that Jimmy Johnson has ever sniveled. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: (Debatable): LeBron and the Lakers are engaged in extension talks and how concerning is Stafford's elbow injury for the Rams?
